title: Putin holds talks with Maduro in Moscow
description:
(4 Oct 2017) RESTRICTION SUMMARY:      AP CLIENTS ONLY

AGENCY POOL - AP CLIENTS ONLY
Moscow - 4 October 2017
1. Various exteriors of the Kremlin 
2. Russian President Vladimir Putin and Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro shaking hands, zoom in 
3. Photographers and cameras 
4. Mid of talks 
5. Russian officials 
6. SOUNDBITE (Russian) Vladimir Putin, Russian President: 
"We see that Venezuela is going through difficult times. ++PAUSING FOR TRANSLATION++ There is an impression that you managed to establish contact with political forces that oppose you." 
7. Wide of talks 
8. SOUNDBITE (Russian) Vladimir Putin, Russian President: 
"The work between our countries continues, including the economic sphere." 
9. Mid of talks 
10. SOUNDBITE (Spanish) Nicolas Maduro, Venezuelan President: 
"I thank you for all the support you have given us, political and diplomatic, in the difficult times which we are living through. We will overcome them." 
11. Venezuelan officials 
12. SOUNDBITE (Spanish) Nicolas Maduro, Venezuelan President: 
"...we can reach agreement on our plans for cooperation in the spheres of energy, agriculture, trade... I'm very thankful for the agreement on grain, it has helped keep consumption in Venezuela stable." 
13. Close up of Maduro 
14. Mid of talks 
STORYLINE:
Russian President Vladimir Putin met with Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro in Moscow on Wednesday. 
Maduro thanked Putin for political and diplomatic support "in difficult times which we are living through." 
===========================================================
